content: © tic-tac-toe egg game by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2024 4 general the eggs these amigurumi are crocheted in continuous rounds mark the 1st st of each round with a stitch marker move that marker up with each round the granny squares these are crocheted in the round the chain 2 in round 1 of the granny squares does not count as a st each next round of the granny squares starts with a stacked double_crochet each round closes with a chain 1 step 1 and a single_crochet in the top of the 1st st of the round step 2 see the 1st photo below this counts as a ch2-space by closing the round in this manner your hook will be in the correct position to start the next round the starting single_crochet which is part of the stacked single_crochet of each round is made over the closing single_crochet of the previous round the starting single_crochet is indicated by the white arrow in the 2nd photo above colors used are mentioned for each part/round the 9 small granny squares of the playing field are crocheted together with the zipper stitch if you are not familiar with this stitch you will find a tutorial here https //youtu be/lt3yuaq6nbm fasten_off means cut the yarn and pull the yarn end up and out of the last st made © tic-tac-toe egg game by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2024 5 the pattern eggs make 5 in color daisy and 5 in color rose mark the 1st st of each round move the stitch marker up after each round round 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring close the magic_ring tight 6 single_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet increase x 2 8 single_crochet round 3 3 single_crochet increase x 2 10 single_crochet round 4 1 single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet x 2 12 single_crochet round 5 2 single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet x 2 14 single_crochet round 6 increase 6 single_crochet x 2 16 single_crochet round 7 3 single_crochet increase 4 single_crochet x 2 18 single_crochet round 8 single_crochet increase 7 single_crochet x 2 20 single_crochet rounds 9 - 11 20 single_crochet 20 single_crochet round 12 decrease x 10 10 single_crochet when you are halfway this round stuff the egg firmly with stuffing material of your choice round 13 single_crochet decrease x 3 single_crochet fasten_off 7 single_crochet with a darning needle string the yarn end through the flo as shown in the 1st photo below of all remaining 7 single_crochet pull closed tight the bump will be pulled flat as soon as you work away the yarn end into the egg © tic-tac-toe egg game by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2024 6 front panel small granny square make 9 round 1 dusty light green in a magic_ring chain 2 this does not count as a st 3 double_crochet chain 2 x 3 3 double_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in the 1st double_crochet of this round to close the round remember the chain 1 and single_crochet together count as a ch2-space
